# Contacts CLI Tool

A simple command-line interface (CLI) for managing your contact list, built with **Node.js**, **Commander**, and **Nanoid**.

## Features

* **List**: Display all contacts in a formatted table.
* **Get**: Find a specific contact by their unique ID.
* **Add**: Create a new contact with an auto-generated ID.
* **Remove**: Delete a contact from the database by ID.

### Installation

**Clone the repository:**
   ```bash
   git clone [https://github.com/ChyrkinD/goit-node-cli.git](https://github.com/ChyrkinD/goit-node-cli.git)
   ```
